metadata.title: CVE-2022-47673 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Binutils addr2line before 2.39.3, functionparse_module contains multiple out of bound reads which may cause a denialof service or other unspecified impacts.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
